title: what is the paid circulation of the Star News currently and what was it 5 and 10 years ago?
text:
Sorry
for the delay. Si Cantwell, our Myreporter manager, is on vacation, so
we are trying to answer questions as best we can in his absence. Your
question should be answered in a few days.

As soon as it's posted, we'll send you an e-mail with a link to the
answer.
